While resting, Tucson could not help but think about what possibly happened=
 to his Autobot comrades.  He had put out a call but no one had replied.  H=
e wondered if it were possible that he may be the sole surviving Autobot an=
d that the Maximals were the mainstay of Cybertron.  He could hear Kenzo in=
 the room, and he was anxious to know if his leader, Rodimus Prime, and his=
 other friends were still functioning.

"Kenzo, I - don't remember much bef=
ore meeting up with Lord Perseus on Atlantis.. Before I - met you, I - was =
helping Rodimus fend off a Decepticon attack.  I- got shot, and that was th=
at.  I - don't remember anything else..  Is - Rodimus Prime still alive?  A=
nd are - the other Autobots still alive as well? I tried - to contact them =
but - got no response.  I'm - a bit concerned.  Am I the only one left or -=
 are there others still functioning?"
